Keywords: Asgardian , Avengers , Brute , Fantastic Four
Real Name: Jennifer Walters
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking
MEGINGJORD, THE BELT OF STRENGTH: FREE: Choose one:
*Telekinesis as FREE, but only to target an adjacent friendly character.
*Generate a heavy object.
*This turn when She-Hulk uses an Object Action, increase the damage dealt by 1.
*Heal She-Hulk 2 clicks.

May 2, 2022
Goop
Even though this piece is very simple and uninteresting, its very very good for the point cost. To have that long of a dial with impervious all the way down and healing 2 clicks every turn can be extremely difficult to deal with, especially at lower point games. If you take out their psyblast pieces early she's going to be really hard to deal with.
March 24, 2022
KCSuperman
Where do I begin… this figure is amazing… and jaw dropping at the same time. How is she only 100 points (how is destroyer prime for that matter)? Compare this figure to the battle world prime (both 19 imperv shulks). Yeah the prime has the perplex/leadership… and the added power deprivation, but she is 2 clicks less and costs 30 more points, and doesn’t have near the defenses or damage output this thing has. Where will the game be in 3 years time? Will I be scoffing at this dial as well?

Bobcat2022
Okay, haven't played much since they semi-retired Super Strength, so, to be clear: she can generate heavy objects for free, but--at the time of this set's release--an Object Action (CLOSE or RANGE) does not make a distinction between heavy and light objects?
